snippet: President Hugo Chávez made a theatrical return home on Friday after receiving medical treatment in Cuba, joking in his first public appearance in three weeks in an effort to quash rumors about his health.
abstract: Venezuela's Pres Hugo Chevez makes theatrical return home after receiving medical treatment in Cuba, joking in his first public appearance in three weeks in an effort to quash rumors about his health.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez made a theatrical return home on Friday after receiving medical treatment in Cuba, joking in his first public appearance in three weeks in an effort to quash rumors about his health.
